SEARCH
Package com.cvut.fel.pjv.Utilities

Class GameSerializer

java.lang.Object
com.cvut.fel.pjv.Utilities.GameSerializer
public class GameSerializer extends Object
The GameSerializer class provides methods for loading and saving game states. It handles serialization and deserialization of game data.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameSerializer

      public GameSerializer(GameController game, Board board, ControlsView controlsView, BoardView boardView)
      Constructs a GameSerializer object with the specified game components.
      Parameters:
      game - The GameController instance controlling the game.
      board - The Board instance representing the game board.
      controlsView - The ControlsView instance for displaying game controls.
      boardView - The BoardView instance for displaying the game board.

  • Method Details

    • loadGame

      public void loadGame(File save)
      Loads a game state from a specified file.
      Parameters:
      save - The file containing the saved game state.

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame(String filename, int time) throws IOException
      Saves the current game state to a file with the specified filename.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the file to save the game state to.
      time - The remaining time for the current turn.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while writing to the file.

    • appendToHistory

      public void appendToHistory(String turn)
      Appends a turn to the game history.
      Parameters:
      turn - The turn to append to the history.

    • clearHistory

      public void clearHistory()
      Clears the game history.

    • getLastTurn

      public String getLastTurn()
      Retrieves and removes the last turn from the game history.
      Returns:
      The last turn in the history.
